name: Brick Stack VR
description: Surround yourself by three walls of falling bricks as you work as fast as you can to clear them.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel® i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better Storage: 50 MB available space
